name: bishop
title: The Bishop
joke: Does your code need to a medival cleansing? Well hereâ€™s the duck for the job.

name: jack
joke: Need a bit of luck while swimming through your code? It doesn't get better than Captain Quack.
title: Captain Quack

name: bavarian
joke: Does your code make a duck wish he had a stiff drink? The Bavarian comes prepared.
title: The Bavarian

name: squawk
joke: Are you the captian of your code? Live long and prosper with this captain by your side.
title: Mr. Squawk

name: classic
joke: Here's a duck that's as safe a play as your Java code. For people who use the acronym KISS a lot.
title: The Classic

name: off
joke: This Duck has seen one too many PHP codebases, but maybe you have too! Go crazy together!
title: The Disturbed

name: french
joke: If you view coding as an art and a tool of self discovery this cultured duck is right there with you.
title: Monsieur Duck

name: sigmond
joke: Bugs so bad you need to see a shrink? Or maybe an ego boost? This duck can help.
title: Sigmond

name: ainthavenit
joke: Do you work from home sometimes just so you don't have to wear pants? This duck gets that.
title: Ain't Having it

name: surgeon
title: The Surgeon
joke: Do you have to tread lightly in a legacy systems with no tests? This duck's steady hands can help.

name: donald
title: The Donald
joke: Sprint points are down? Of course they are. They're awful. The worst. Start coding again! Big League!

name: bat
title: Batduck
joke: Don't be the programmer your codebase deserves. Be the one it needs.

name: holmes
title: Holmes
joke: Does fixing a bug in your codebase involve following a trail of clues? This duck is the best in the biz.

name: mozart
title: Mozart
joke: Are you a functional programmer? Well few can compose better than this duck!

name: potter
title: Mr. Ponder
joke: Ever wish you had a wand to wave away the bugs? This duck brings his own.
